title: Stalia expansionary MP SR effect on nat unemp rate

content.question: Suppose the country of Stalia is currently experiencing a recession, and in response, the central bank carries out expansionary monetary policy. As a result, what will happen to its natural rate of unemployment in the short run?

choices.label: It will increase as frictional unemployment increases.
It will increase as structural unemployment decreases.
It will decrease as cyclical unemployment increases.
It will decrease as structural and cyclical unemployment decrease.
It will remain the same as cyclical unemployment decreases.

content.answer: It will remain the same as cyclical unemployment decreases.
